name: Firefighting: Into The Flames
description:
Firefighting : Into The Flames 

A Semi-sim firefighting game that is currently in development. It is being developed on the Unreal Engine 4, and will be released on steam when it is further along for around $9.99-$14.99.

It will be an Open World Multiplayer/COOP game w/ 1-16 players, all making a difference on the fire ground. Currently the game has just one demo level that is constantly being updated as new mechanics get added. Open world will launch with the game on steam. 

Current Game play features all available with online Multiplayer with up to 4 people currently :

-Fire Suppression

-Forcible Entry

-Throwing Ladders /Climbing through windows

-Fire Spread System

Many more exciting features are under development now

Upcoming Features include: 

Driving/Pumping Fire Apparatus

Searching / Retrieving Victims

Horizontal/Vertical Ventilation 

Interactive Hose Line

The dream behind the game. I have played a lot of firefighting games, and they never seem to get it right, so I decided to make it myself. I have been a Volunteer Firefighter at an urban department that runs a high volume of calls for about 9 years, and a Paid Firefighter/EMT for 4 years now. I wanted to make a game that was fun, yet engaging for everyone while stile sticking to the correct details.
